original_text: There is no remembrance of former things; neither shall there be any remembrance of things that are to come with those that shall come after.
korean_text: 이전 세대들이 기억됨이 없으니 장래 세대도 그 후 세대들과 함께 기억됨이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: There is no remembrance of former things
neither shall there be any remembrance of things that are to come
sentences.korean_translation: 앞으로 올 일들도 기억되지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: with those that shall come after
